definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Spare parts management, repair and cost control.
sentences.chinese: 協助負責相關零備件管理，控制維修費用。

sentences.english: In charge of checking and accepting for all utility equipments or machines to be maintained.
sentences.chinese: 負責動力設備零備件及材料計劃，到貨驗收及保管。

sentences.english: Follow up the new product implementation projects (CRD &PCM) for Spare parts.
sentences.chinese: 跟蹤在新產品研發時，零備件文件的創建和更新。

sentences.english: In charge of management on spare parts for all utility equipment or machines.
sentences.chinese: 負責動力設備零備件及材料計劃，到貨驗收及保管。
